item.title: Hearing Aids Are Cool
item.description: Bow ties are cool! Fezzes are cool! Hearing aids are cool! Personal story time! I’ve been wearing hearing aids since the 3rd grade. My folks drove me down to Florida State University to get a hearing test and a fitting for some new aids. I lost one of my first pairs in a cardboard box in a cabin in the woods and my parents didn’t even kill me. In the intervening 30 years I’ve been through a few sets of aids.
